DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.gift_cards.gift_card_id, sales.gift_cards.gift_card_number, sales.gift_cards.customer_id, inventory.get_customer_name_by_customer_id(sales.gift_cards.customer_id) AS customer, sales.gift_cards.first_name, sales.gift_cards.middle_name, sales.gift_cards.last_name, sales.get_gift_card_balance(sales.gift_cards.gift_card_id, finance.get_value_date(@OfficeId)) AS balance FROM sales.gift_cards WHERE sales.gift_cards.deleted = 0;
